title: Falafel Salam - Food Truck
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Middle Eastern, Take-out only, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This falafel food truck offers around 4 vegan choices, including the house falafel, house vegan shawarma, middle eastern salad, in-house-made hummus. Uses non-GMO tofu. All except pita is gluten-free. Check website for latest locations.
